textBeforeTable: Compare the The Select Foam 15" Grandis HD™ to the TEMPUR GrandBed, and you’ll experience the same pressure relieving experience and impeccable styling, for far less the price tag. Not everything’s the same though: Select Foam used a Gel-infused memory foam in their beds to ensure that you stay cool and comfortable at night. Gel Foam has the same benefits of memory foam, but sleeps up to 3X cooler. Select Foam has successfully combined the innovations of the Serta iComfort and Tempur-Pedic into one amazing mattress collection. Same Look, Same Feel, Cooler Sleeping, and 50% Off. Select Foam 15" Grandis HD™ vs. Tempur-Pedic GrandBed You have 100 Nights to try our mattresses, mattress sets, and adjustable beds in your home. If you are unsatisfied with your Grandis HD™ gel memory foam mattress, we will pick it up at our cost, refunding your complete purchase price. This is the advantage of Free Shipping both ways; only from Select Foam. 100 Night, 100% Risk-Free Sleep Trial The Select Foam 15" Grandis HD™ comes with a Lifetime Warranty. We stand behind our product with the industry’s best warranty. Any indentation in the foam greater than ¾” and we’ll replace the mattress at our cost. Lifetime Warranty The Grandis HD™ is hypoallergenic and dust mite resistant.
